ygData.subject: Re: More advice please.
ygData.msgSnippet: I think 14th level spells are like 7 plat apiece.  Or thereabouts. You will want to buy: healing smite bind affinity expulse undead invisibility to undead
ygData.messageBody:
I think 14th level spells are like 7 plat apiece. Or thereabouts.
You will want to buy:
healing
smite
bind affinity
expulse undead
invisibility to undead (it's really cheap, anyway)
cancel magic
and symbol of transal (+hp buff)

Symbol of Transal will require cat's eye agates to cast. They are
2gp apiece. So, pick up a few of those as well. Your group members
will thank you for this buff.

The less useful spells are halo of light, endure disease and endure
cold.

As a side note, if you turn in a rabid grizzly pelt to Priestess
Caulria in N. Qeynos, she will give you endure disease (a 7 plat
value)


>From: "Alan Raboy" <ARaboy@...>

>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] More advice please.

>I too should be making 14 some time soon, and was wondering how much it's
>going to cost to buy all the needed spells. I've got about 40 pp in the
>bank, and am wearing all leather. Will this be enough cash and what spells
>should be purchased first?
>
> >>> "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...> 11/29/99 02:29PM >>>
>From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
>
>I should be making 14 later this week and would like to know what spells
>are
>best to get first. As you all are aware money is a definite problem at
>this level.
>
>I had a wonderful week as far as donations to my equipment goes. I was
>given a banded tunic and a blackened neck guard plus getting rawhide gloves
>from a zombie really helped. A few lootings of ghouls has also helped my
>bank account a lot.
>
>I am still having trouble finding groups at times but so far with only one
>exception I have not lost a party member yet. The only exception was an
>ill-fated venture into Oasis when I was still 11th. I really think that
>upon making 14 I will head back to GFay. I have nothing against Freeport
>and EC but I think the humans are all jealous of us elves. (grins)
>
>Thanks again all,
>Yilari, High Elven Cleric of Tunare
>Erollisi Marr
>Blades of Honor Guild
